fieldName: Adjust difficulty of IX Battlegroup and Trinity Worlds forces
fieldDescription:
• Challenging adds +1 population to IX Battlegroup and Trinity Worlds colonies, gives their administrators the AI Assisted Command skill that increases accessibility and garrison fleet size, and increases the size of Honor Guard fleets at Vertex Station.
• Hard only adds AI Assisted Command to administrators.
• Easy removes AI Assisted Command from NPCs.

Population boost is applied when the game begins. Easy mode can be toggled any time.

fieldName: Enable Trinity Worlds allies of the IX Battlegroup
fieldDescription: Enable the Trinity Worlds, a high-tech faction allied with, and beholden to, the IX Battlegroup. These hostile forces will make the game more challenging. Requires starting a new game.

fieldName: Enable Panoptic Interface hullmods on IX Battlegroup warships
fieldDescription: Encountered IX Battlegroup warships may have Panopticon Interface hullmods installed, at 30%% chance for fleet commanders, and 10%% for other ships. Honor guard ships have an additional 20%% chance. Requires reload.

fieldName: Enable the Panopticon to suppress black markets
fieldDescription: Worlds under Panopticon Monitoring will suppress the black market. Can be toggled at any time.

fieldName: Replace the bombed pirate colony of Scorn with Marzanna
fieldDescription: Start the game with the IX Battlegroup having conquered rather than bombed the existing colony in their home system. Replaces Scorn with Marzanna, an industrialized IX Battlegroup protectorate that makes the main faction more powerful. Requires starting a new game.

fieldName: Enable IX Battlegroup and Trinity Worlds anti-blockade system defenses
fieldDescription: Enable the Kresnik Mechanism at Vertex Station in Zorya and the Soliton Siegebreaker at Fort Culmen in Danu to counter large scale blockades. Requires reload.
Cause the IX Battlegroup to treat the (HMI) Brighton Federation as beneath their notice. Starting and maximum reputation set to neutral instead of hostile. Can be toggled at any time.

fieldName: Reduce hostilities between Pirates and Independents
fieldDescription: Start the game with the Pirates being inhospitable towards the Independents, rather than outright hostile. Without this setting, independent and pirate trade fleets visiting IX Battlegroup and Trinity Worlds will regularly engage each other in the middle of conducting trade.
